title: Terrarium Adventure - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Cheats   Contracts   Druids   Female Protagonist   Gamers   Quirky Characters   Reverse Harem   Transported into a Game World   Wealthy Characters   World Tree

description: Abandoned production game where all the users left and only core fans exist. Summoned to a strange world as soon as unlocking the last achievement ‘Possess 999,999,999 diamonds’. Inside which has been released yet while carrying 999,999,999 diamonds. Conquering the game world with endless diamonds!>
